    • Uses of QueryFilter in org.apache.nutch.analysis.lang

      Classes in org.apache.nutch.analysis.lang that implement QueryFilter 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  LanguageQueryFilter
      Handles "lang:" query clauses, causing them to search the "lang" field indexed by LanguageIdentifier.

    • Uses of QueryFilter in org.apache.nutch.microformats.reltag

      Classes in org.apache.nutch.microformats.reltag that implement QueryFilter 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  RelTagQueryFilter
      Handles "tag:" query clauses.

    • Uses of QueryFilter in org.apache.nutch.searcher

      Classes in org.apache.nutch.searcher that implement QueryFilter 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  FieldQueryFilter
      Translate query fields to search the same-named field, as indexed by an IndexingFilter.
      class  RawFieldQueryFilter
      Translate raw query fields to search the same-named field, as indexed by an IndexingFilter.

    • Uses of QueryFilter in org.apache.nutch.searcher.basic

      Classes in org.apache.nutch.searcher.basic that implement QueryFilter 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  BasicQueryFilter
      The default query filter.

    • Uses of QueryFilter in org.apache.nutch.searcher.more

      Classes in org.apache.nutch.searcher.more that implement QueryFilter 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  DateQueryFilter
      Handles "date:" query clauses, causing them to search the field "date" indexed by MoreIndexingFilter.java
      class  TypeQueryFilter
      Handles "type:" query clauses, causing them to search the field indexed by MoreIndexingFilter.

    • Uses of QueryFilter in org.apache.nutch.searcher.site

      Classes in org.apache.nutch.searcher.site that implement QueryFilter 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  SiteQueryFilter
      Handles "site:" query clauses, causing them to search the field indexed by SiteIndexingFilter.

    • Uses of QueryFilter in org.apache.nutch.searcher.url

      Classes in org.apache.nutch.searcher.url that implement QueryFilter 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  URLQueryFilter
      Handles "url:" query clauses, causing them to search the field indexed by BasicIndexingFilter.

    • Uses of QueryFilter in org.creativecommons.nutch

      Classes in org.creativecommons.nutch that implement QueryFilter 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  CCQueryFilter
      Handles "cc:" query clauses, causing them to search the "cc" field indexed by CCIndexingFilter.
